mapper.select: select r.*, g.*, d.*, i.fileName from reservation r, goods g, goods_detail d, goods_img i where r.goods_id = g.goods_id and r.goods_uroom = d.goods_uroom and g.goods_id = d.goods_id and r.goods_id = i.goods_id and r.hp = #{hp} group by rid;

select r.*, g.*, d.*, i.fileName from reservation r, goods g, goods_detail d, goods_img i where r.goods_id = g.goods_id and r.goods_uroom = d.goods_uroom and g.goods_id = d.goods_id and r.goods_id = i.goods_id and r.hp = #{hp} and r.name = #{name} group by rid;

select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS r.*, g.goods_checkIn, g.goods_checkOut, g.goods_motel_usetime, d.goods_room_type, g.goods_name from reservation r, goods g, goods_detail d
UNIX_TIMESTAMP(r.checkIn) >= #{date1} and #{date2} > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(r.checkIn)
and r.checkIn = r.checkOut
and r.checkIn != r.checkOut
and g.uid = #{uid} and r.goods_id = g.goods_id and r.goods_uroom = d.goods_uroom and r.checkIn > now()
order by rDate asc limit #{offset},#{count}

SELECT
date(r.checkIn)
DATE_FORMAT(r.checkIn, '%U')
month(r.checkIn)
year(r.checkIn)
AS date, sum(r.price) AS sum FROM reservation r, goods g where reservationType = "예약완료" and g.uid = #{uid} and r.goods_id = g.goods_id GROUP BY date WITH ROLLUP;
select business_point from member where uid = #{uid}
